pages.text: $(item)Bundles/$ can be used to store different types of items in the same inventory slot, up to a single stack. Note that items with a stack size of less than 64 will count proportionally based on their stack sizes.$(br2)$(item)Seed Pouches/$ work in a similar manner, but can only store $(item)Seeds/$. However, they are able to store up to 10 stacks.
